languages.text: "Слушай сюда, гроксова лепешка. Для тех, кто на своих руку поднимает, у нас в подполье есть свои средства поквитаться. Смекаешь?"

traits.locale_text: РТ умеет ботать по фене, что-нибудь эпично говорит

languages.text: "Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"
languages.original_text: "Слушай сюда, гроксова лепешка. Для тех, кто на своих руку поднимает, у нас в подполье есть свои средства поквитаться. Смекаешь?"

traits.locale_text: "Listen here, groxpat. Us from the underbelly have means to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"
"Listen here, groxpat. Us from the underbelly have means to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"
"Listen here, groxpat. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"
"Listen here, groxpat. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"
"Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"
"Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"
"Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"
"Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"

languages.text: “听清楚了，蠢货。都是道上混的，哪个活腻了的敢呲毛，咱就给他开瓢放血，懂我的意思吧？”
languages.original_text: "Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: “听清楚了，蠢货。都是道上混的，哪个活腻了的敢呲毛，咱就给他开瓢放血，懂我的意思吧？”
“听着点，蠢货。咱们都是道上混的，哪个活腻了的敢呲毛，咱就给他开瓢放血，懂我的意思吧？”

languages.text: 「いいか、クソ野郎。この下層の世界では、仲間に手を出せば、同じ報いを受けるのが道理というものだ。わかったか？」
languages.original_text: "Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: 「いいか、クソ野郎。この下層の世界では、仲間に手を出せば、同じ報いを受けるのが道理というものだ。わかったか？」
「いいか、クソ野郎。この下層の世界では、仲間に手を出せば、同じ報いを受けるのが道理というものだ。わかったか？」

languages.text: «Escúchame bien, cagarro de grox. A nosotros los de los barrios bajos, quienes nos la hacen, nos la pagan con la misma moneda. ¿Entiendes?».
languages.original_text: "Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: «Escúchame bien, cagarro de grox. A nosotros los de los barrios bajos, quienes nos la hacen, nos la pagan con la misma moneda. ¿Entiendes?».
«Escúchame bien, cagarro de grox. A nosotros los de los barrios bajos, quienes nos la hacen, nos la pagan con la misma moneda. ¿Entiendes?».

languages.text: "Buraya bak groks boku. Biz ayaktakımı, bizden birine ilişenlere aynen karşılığını veririz. Anladın mı?"
languages.original_text: "Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: "Buraya bak groks boku. Biz ayaktakımı, bizden birine ilişenlere aynen karşılığını veririz. Anladın mı?"
"Buraya bak groks iti. Biz ayaktakımı, bizden birine ilişenlere aynen karşılığını veririz. Anladın mı?"

languages.text: « Une petite minute, fiente de grox. Nous autres, les gens des bas-fonds, on sait rendre la pareille à ceux qui nous cherchent des noises. Œil pour œil. Pigé ? »
languages.original_text: "Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: « Une petite minute, fiente de grox. Nous autres, les gens des bas-fonds, on sait rendre la pareille à ceux qui nous cherchent des noises. Œil pour œil. Pigé ? »
« Écoute un peu, bouse de grox. Nous autres, les gens des bas-fonds, on sait rendre la pareille à ceux qui nous cherchent des noises. Œil pour œil. Pigé ? »

languages.text: "Alles klar, Groxscheiße. Wir aus der Schattenseite kennen Wege, es unseren Feinden zu vergelten ... mit gleicher Münze. Verstanden?"
languages.original_text: "Listen here, you groxshit. Us from the underbelly have ways to repay those who go after our own — in the same coin. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: "Alles klar, Groxscheiße. Wir aus der Schattenseite kennen Wege, es unseren Feinden zu vergelten ... mit gleicher Münze. Verstanden?"
"Alles klar, Groxgesicht. Wir aus der Schattenseite kennen Wege, es unseren Feinden zu vergelten ... mit gleicher Münze. Verstanden?"
